poll_list.title: Ratification Poll for Amend MIP62 to Allow for Changing Communication Responsibilities (MIP4c2-SP33) - February 13, 2023

discourse_list.title: MIP4c2-SP33: Amend MIP62 to Allow for Changing Communication Responsibilities

content.content: MIP4c2-SP33: Amend MIP62 to Allow for Changing Communication Responsibilities  Preamble MIP4c2-SP#: 33 MIP to be amended: MIP62 Author(s): @LongForWisdom Contributors: Tags: mip-amendment Status: Accepted Date Proposed: 2023-01-11 Date Ratified: 2023-02-27 Ratification Poll URL: https://vote.makerdao.com/polling/QmQjv36P   Specification  Motivation This amendment is intended to:  Replace GovComms as the responsible party for communicating offboardings through MIP62. Prevent the requirement for a token vote in the event we run into this same issue in the future.   Amended MIPs and Components  MIP62c2 (Modified) MIP62c3 (Modified) MIP62c5 (Added)   Patch Notes  Replaced references to GovComms with references to a ‘Communication Coordinator’ defined in new component MIP62c5. MIP62c5 defines GovAlpha as the new Communication Coordinator. MIP62c5 allows MIP Editors to modify MIP62c5 without a governance vote to refer to a new Communication Coordinator if:  The previous coordinator is unwilling or unable to fulfill the responsibility. A new coordinator is willing to take on the communication role.   MIP62c5 requires public communication of any modifications by MIP Editors. Fixed some minor formatting stuff in the MIP component summary.   Amendment Pull Request   github.com/makerdao/mips         MIP62 Amendment: Minimal set of changes to resolve responsibilities changing.   makerdao:master ← LongForWisdom:mip62-remove-govcomms              opened 01:05PM - 11 Jan 23 UTC                 LongForWisdom               +29 -18       (also some formatting fixes)        Relevant Information N/A
content.GPT-summary: The post is an amendment proposal for MIP62, which aims to replace GovComms with a 'Communication Coordinator' and prevent the requirement for a token vote in the event of a similar issue in the future. The proposal includes a minimal set of changes to resolve the changing responsibilities. The post also includes relevant information such as the amendment pull request and the ratification poll URL.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: This is a summary of the contents of this subproposal and its impact, from GovAlpha’s perspective:  This is a valid subproposal MIP4c2 (Amendment Process for MIPs Older than 3 Months). This subproposal amends MIP62: Collateral Offboarding Process. Specifically, this amendment:  Adds component MIP62c5. This component introduces a “Communication Coordinator” (CC), defines GovAlpha as the new CC, and allows MIP Editors to appoint a new CC without the need of a governance vote. Replaces references to GovComms with references to the CC. Fixes formatting stuff in the MIP component summary.   If this subproposal is ratified, this PR will be merged into the MIP repository. This proposal has been assigned Low-Impact based on the methodology listed here.  Disclaimer: These summaries are intended to be a guide and not a source of truth. You remain responsible for any actions you take on the grounds of this information. Please note the date when the summary was last updated to judge accuracy. Updated 2023-01-17
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal

content.content: My compliments to the @MIP-Editors. Please assign an appropriate number, and feel free to make any formatting changes you feel are worthwhile.
I would like to formally submit this MIP for the March 2023 cycle. Thank you, @MIP-Editors
